message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40.  It's in our best interest to settle this quickly before inflation eats away at the value.
Let's split the difference.  I'll take $55 and you get $45.  We can avoid further inflation and still get a fair share.

I understand you want a larger share, Bob, but the longer we wait the less value our money holds. I'm willing to take a slightly smaller cut than my last offer, 55/45 split in my favor. Let's finalize this.
